Blog.post: today...morning i about 6 wake up pomx2..than go sch lo....it was rainning and i almost late for sch..when i reach sch..is about 7.22 a.m...than go to hall lo....after tt...i so suay lo..tio caught by my form teacher to dye back my hair...so have to stand up in the stage wif my frenz cos they also dye hair lo..than the VP tok to us for a litter while and ask us go hm lo...for dye back..than when recess i go hm and dye back..than about 12.30 come back to sch lo....after tt..i decide to meet my didi wan...than i slp till 11.20 p.m at night..haha...

oh yeah..today is moi birthday...hehe~...i today about 6.30 wake up than go pomx2 lo..when i reach sch is about 7.16 a.m...so i go canteen to eat lo...than my classmates wish me happy birthday....hahaha...so after eating...we went to hall to have out sch song...so after all..we have back class to have out lesson lo...till about 2.pm...than wanna faster go hm and pomx2 to meet my gan di..than my papa(alex) put me to take pic at J8..than i go lo...so when reach there..i noe 3 gal from BPSS cos is my papa the gan meix2 lo...than we together take pic...so after all..i go go hm and pomx2 than meet my gan di and da^zhu lo..they all at heartland mall lo..than when i reach..i ask them pei me eat...hehe.~...eat liao we go take pic again...haha...finish taking..they left me and my da zhu...than go to hougang south there the sea-saw wait for them...than suddenly..have 2 birthday cake...so peiseh sia..so many ppl around there...than sing happy birthday song...so when i cut the 1st cake...than take pic using hp..haha...than blow liao they ask me use my mouth and take out the candle...my gan di pull me into the cake than tio the cake around my mouth...haha...than here come the last cake...same..but when i wanna eat the cake..they take the cream and put on my face...than i do the same to them..all kanna onli my da zhu nv kanna...at last i put at her....haha...so all oily liao..go to the CC there to wash up lo...than they decide to go my hm pomx2..then we take cab go my hm...than finally...about 9...we go eat and par pool lo..than i tio beat 16 time cos i 16 year old mah..by my gan di.....haha...so i end here...nth liao lo...bye take care...

Oh Yeah!!~~~...yesterday i slp till 6++ and wake up....after i wake up go msn tok for a while and go back slp till 7.15...than i go pomx2 and call my gan di see wheather where he....so he tell me he at hougang mall wif my da zhu...than i decide to go down lo...than when i reach hougang mall..i saw my gan di,da zhu and 1 more of their frenz...so i jio them to go foodcourt eat sia...haven eat cos wake up too late sia...than i and my gan di eat chicken rice and xue ping eat noodle lo...haha~...we sit outside to eat...till about 8++ i jio them par pool but onli i and my gan di inside playing than da zhu and her frenz go par lan game lo...over all score i win him 4 match/4match...yeah am..haha~...than we go find my da zhu lo...suddenly li ping call up and wanna meet us...but i dunno her well de...so they decide to go pa sub ma lam to walk walk...than like nth sia...so we go to hougang mall to decide weather go hm or ton lo...than i wanna ton...but they say later nth to do...than my gan di tink of swimming(mean play majong)so all say swee lo...than we go my gan di frenz hm to take majong and go play lo....than when they play..all like sianZz sianZz sia...than my da zhu...like keep on lost lo...than suddenly all dun wan to play liao..so we play com and tok cock lo...after tt my gan di the first wan to slp liao follow by my da zhu...so i disturb da zhu and sanyang her lo..suddenly she listen to song than cry lo..than sanyang her more lo..but i feel so close to her lo....so happy sia...than the end all slp left me onli lo...than i there listen song...till 6++ and they all finally wake up...i have to end here bah...haha~..take care....love u da zhu 4ever

yoZ..today is a fine day sia...i wake up in the morning at 6.15 and go pomx2..than later go sch liao..when i in sch...i so stress of my homework lo...but..still can catch up lo...than after tt...i waiting for time to pass to meet my gan didi lo...so i go hm and pomx2 again..hahaz...than about 5.30 i go out to meet him...so we decide to go to riverview more to have out dinner...there food it so exp lo..but still ok..so he ask me sum lane question when eating lo..than i tink and tink than sum of them is wrong sia...than keep on laught lo...after tt...we go to mac there to sit down..than meet a old man tt a bit ki siao wan..tok to us so bo liao tink but i can see tt he gd sia...so i wanna go run away arbo later tok till tml liao...than we decide to go to xue ping hm down stair...than tok cock for a while go to the shopping mall there lo..hahaz...than after tt i wanna go hm liao..but then my gan di call xue ping lo..so we go back the same place there...than tok cock for a while and i also g2g liao lo..than my gan di ask her question lo..than it a sad tink lo...so when on the way to the bus stop i keep on ask him wad do u ask her lo...he look like dun wan to tell but i force him lo..so he tell me and it a sad tink lo...i also can feel it but..i act happy lo...xue ping is mine first person who reject me lo...hahaz...so after tt..i feeling cry but..when i reach hm than cry out lo...haiz...hahaz...but at last still happy now de....hehe~..i stop here bah...nite..
